channel.title: Subpatch : LFO Pack 1.0
channel.description:
Hallo there i made some LFO subpatches.
Follow the sendspace link and grab the rar unpack in ur subpatch folder and enjoy :smile:
https://www.sendspace.com/file/cekidp
here is some info.
LFO PACK 1.0
Different kinds of LFO´s.
1. LFO-SIN.
Simple Sine LFO.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
2. LFO-SAW.
Simple Saw LFO.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
3. LFO-SQ.
Simple Square LFO.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
4. SAW-SQ.
SAW-SQ LFO Is A Combination Of A Saw wave LFO And A Square Wave Lfo.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
4b. SAW-SQ - MOD IN.
SAW-SQ LFO Is A Combination Of A Saw wave LFO And A Square Wave Lfo With Modulation Input.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
5. SIN-SQ.
SIN-SQ LFO Is A Combination Of A Sine wave LFO And A Square Wave Lfo.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
5b. SIN-SQ - MOD IN.
SIN-SQ LFO Is A Combination Of A Sine wave LFO And A Square Wave Lfo With Modulation Input.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
6. SIN-SAW.
SIN-SAW LFO Is A Combination Of A Sine wave LFO And A Saw Wave Lfo.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount
6b. SIN-SAW - MOD IN.
SIN-SAW LFO Is A Combination Of A Saw wave LFO And A Square Wave Lfo With Modulation Input.
RATE DIV = Rate Divider RATE = Rate Amount AMOUNT = Modulation Amount

item.title: Subpatch : LFO Pack 1.0
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

About the Amount in:

I think that when there is only one input on a subpatch it does not label it. you can enter a name but it doesnt show the name. When you add an second input you will see the names. Check the picture I have attached.

subpatch naming.png1273x403 76.6 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Subpatch : LFO Pack 1.0
item.dc:creator: @MartijnVerhallen martijn
item.description:
@MartijnVerhallen wrote:

i think it was a dial with that curious name

Read full topic

item.title: Subpatch : LFO Pack 1.0
item.dc:creator: @Kalle challester
item.description:
@Kalle wrote:

Hmm i cant see the amount in.. here they are all called mod in so thats a bit strange

And yes i will upload them here aswell.

SAW-SQ - LFO.axs (3.5 KB) SIN-SQ LFO.axs (3.6 KB) SIN-SQ - MOD IN.axs (4.7 KB) SIN-SAW LFO.axs (3.6 KB) SIN-SAW - MOD IN.axs (4.7 KB) LFO - SINE.axs (3.0 KB) SAW-SQ - MOD IN.axs (4.8 KB) LFO - SAW.axs (2.7 KB) LFO - SQ.axs (2.7 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Subpatch : LFO Pack 1.0
item.dc:creator: @MartijnVerhallen martijn
item.description:
@MartijnVerhallen wrote:

--> thanks.
it's very useful to have small helper patches !!

ps: the sin/saw mod in has a "amonut in" - should be 'amount" ?

ps2: why not post them here? you can upload multiple items art once if you select all of them in the upload screen

Read full topic

Hallo there i made some LFO subpatches.

RATE = Rate Amount
